General.Name: Shenzhen iN-Cube Automation Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen iN-Cube Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of industrial automation equipment and automation equipment accessories in China and internationally. The company offers optical test products, such as optical induction test, optical identification test, and automatic optical defect inspection equipment; and functional test products, including electrical performance testing, wireless charging test, touch function test, mechanical testing, acoustic test equipment, and withstand voltage test equipment. It also provides consumer electronics assembly products comprising flipping and swinging machines, universal loading and unloading machines, ring disc to steel sheet carrier plate dischargers, tray to sheet carrier dischargers, fully automatic swinging machines, automatic accessories attaching machines, single and double station automatic accessory attachment machines, meson film sticking machines, modular fully automatic assembly lines, display detection and lens bonding machines, and reflow type auxiliary material attaching machines. In addition, the company offers semiconductor product assembly products consisting of blue film die bonding and automatic blue film die bonding machines. It serves consumer electronics, industrial electronics, automotive electronics, and semiconductor industries, as well as used to manufacture electronic cigarettes. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
